title: KKR raises $6.4 billion for Asia Pacific infrastructure fund
description: KKR first established its global infrastructure team and strategy in 2008 and the Firm manages approximately $56 billion in assets under management across more than 80 infrastructure investments and has a team of more than 90 dedicated infrastructure investment professionals globally.
